Introduction

FAVE1 is a three-member boy group under KISS Entertainment. They debuted in Japan on July 20, 2022 with the single "Zombie".

The group consists of former 100% members Rockhyun, Jonghwan, Chanyong, and Hyukjin.

On June 1 2023, it was announced that Chanyong would be departing from FAVE1. However, they remain close and consider themselves "Forever Four".
